pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create, Modify and Analyse Phylogenetic Trees // Efficient implementations of functions for the creation, modification and analysis of phylogenetic trees. Applications include: generation of trees with specified shapes; analysis of tree shape; rooting of trees and extraction of subtrees; calculation and depiction of node support; calculation of ancestor- descendant relationships; import and export of trees from Newick, Nexus (Maddison et al. 1997) doi:10.1093/sysbio/46.4.590, and TNT http://www.lillo.org.ar/phylogeny/tnt/ formats; and analysis of splits and cladistic information.
